Simple plot

```{r}
plot(1:10, 1:10, col="blue", lty="dashed", axes=FALSE, type="l")
```

Read Weather Data

```{r}
load("E:/R/Chicago Weather/Monthly_Foster_Weather.rda")
```


Plot Humidity out of Foster Monthly Weather.

```{r}
plot(Monthly_Foster_Weather$Month, Monthly_Foster_Weather$Humidity, col="green", type = "p")
```

with inscription

```{r}
plot(Monthly_Foster_Weather$Month, Monthly_Foster_Weather$Humidity, col="blue", type = "p")
text(4, 67, "Humidity in %")
```

Transform the dataframe

```{r}
df <- Monthly_Foster_Weather
```
